nodes.text: "Droid World" was a song performed by Sentient 7 and the Clankers, featuring on their album "Listen Up Meatbags." The song was played by the droid DJ R-3X at Oga's Cantina in the town of Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. R-3X considered "Droid World" to be a smashing hit and claimed that it was the best thing to ever strike the planet.
"Droid World" was first played for the public during the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge panel at Celebration Chicago.
